bibl.title: It's All about Variants: A Variant-Conscious Approach to New Testament Textual Criticism.
bibl.note: Variants and "Original Text" in New Testament Textual Criticism. - The Goal of New Testament Textual Criticism. - A Variant-Conscious Edition of the Greek New Testament [Samples: Luke 24:50-53; Acts 1:1-2, 9-11]. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: EPP Eldon Jay, It's All about Variants: A Variant-Conscious Approach to New Testament Textual Criticism.

Variants and "Original Text" in New Testament Textual Criticism. - The Goal of New Testament Textual Criticism. - A Variant-Conscious Edition of the Greek New Testament [Samples: Luke 24:50-53; Acts 1:1-2, 9-11]. - Conclusion.
